languages.text: Вы поколебали веру сержанта Малгара в устои Империума, посмеявшись над его верностью долгу.
You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.
languages.original_text: Вы поколебали веру сержанта Малгара в устои Империума, посмеявшись над его верностью долгу.

traits.locale_text: You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.

languages.text: Vous avez ébranlé la foi du sergent Malgar dans les fondements de l'Imperium en vous moquant de son dévouement envers son devoir.
languages.original_text: You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez ébranlé la foi du sergent Malgar dans les fondements de l'Imperium en vous moquant de son dévouement envers son devoir.

languages.text: Hiciste temblar la fe del sargento Malgar en los cimientos del Imperium al burlarte de su devoción al deber.
languages.original_text: You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.

traits.locale_text: Hiciste temblar la fe del sargento Malgar en los cimientos del Imperium al burlarte de su devoción al deber.

languages.text: マルガー軍曹の職務への献身を嘲笑し、帝国の基盤への信頼を揺るがしました。
languages.original_text: You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.

traits.locale_text: マルガー軍曹の職務への献身を嘲笑し、帝国の基盤への信頼を揺るがしました。

languages.text: 你嘲笑马尔加军士忠于职守的行为，动摇了他对帝国根基的信念。
languages.original_text: You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.

traits.locale_text: 你嘲笑马尔加军士忠于职守的行为，动摇了他对帝国根基的信念。

languages.text: Du hast Sergeant Malgars Glauben an die Grundfesten des Imperiums erschüttert, indem du über sein Pflichtbewusstsein gespottet hast.
languages.original_text: You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.

traits.locale_text: Du hast Sergeant Malgars Glauben an die Grundfesten des Imperiums erschüttert, indem du über sein Pflichtbewusstsein gespottet hast.

languages.text: Çavuş Malgar'ın vazifesine olan bağlılığıyla alay ederek İmparatorluk'un temellerine olan inancını sarstın.
languages.original_text: You shook Sergeant Malgar's faith in the foundations of the Imperium by scoffing at his devotion to duty.
